content.json:
Conditional Access Monitoring for Reporting Mode

  • Choose policy from dropdown
  • Use timechart es a filter to investigate issues

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend policyName = ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"] 
| distinct tostring(policyName)
parameters.label: Select Policy

content.query:
let pPolicy = dynamic([{Policy}]);
SigninLogs
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend displayName = ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"], result = ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"], browser = DeviceDetail["browser"], deviceId = DeviceDetail["deviceId"], failureReason = tostring(Status["failureReason"])
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies ["displayName"] in (pPolicy)
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies ["result"] in ("reportOnlyFailure","reportOnlySuccess","reportOnlyInterrupted")
| summarize count() by bin (TimeGenerated, 1d), tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"])
content.title: Historic Data Success/Failure for {Policy}
Failed Users and Reasons per selected date | Use as filter for details below

content.query:
let pPolicy = dynamic([{Policy}]);
SigninLogs
//| where startofday(TimeGenerated) == iff(tostring('{datefilter}')=="now",startofday(todatetime(now())),startofday(todatetime('{datefilter:$.x}')))
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend PolicyName = ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"], result = ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"], BrowserDetail = DeviceDetail["browser"], deviceId = DeviceDetail["deviceId"], failureReason = tostring(Status["failureReason"])
| extend KnownDevice = iif(isempty(tostring(deviceId)),"No","Yes")
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies ["displayName"] in (pPolicy)
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies ["result"] in ("reportOnlyFailure","reportOnlyInterrupted")
| summarize count() by tostring(ClientAppUsed)
content.title: Failed UsedClientApp

content.query:
let pPolicy = dynamic([{Policy}]);
SigninLogs
| where startofday(TimeGenerated) == iff(tostring('{datefilter}')=="now",startofday(todatetime(now())),startofday(todatetime('{datefilter:$.x}')))
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend PolicyName = ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"], result = ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"], browser = DeviceDetail["browser"], deviceId = DeviceDetail["deviceId"], failureReason = tostring(Status["failureReason"])
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies ["displayName"] in ({Policy})
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies ["result"] in ("reportOnlyFailure","reportOnlyInterrupted","reportOnlySuccess")
| project-reorder Identity, AppDisplayName, deviceId, browser, result, failureReason, PolicyName
| summarize Failure = countif(result == "reportOnlyFailure"),
            Interrupted = countif(result == "reportOnlyInterrupted"),
            Successful = countif(result == "reportOnlySuccess")         
         by Identity
content.title: Policy results per User

content.query:
let pPolicy = dynamic([{Policy}]);
SigninLogs
| where startofday(TimeGenerated) == iff(tostring('{datefilter}')=="now",startofday(todatetime(now())),startofday(todatetime('{datefilter:$.x}')))
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend PolicyName = ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"], result = ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"], BrowserDetail = DeviceDetail["browser"], deviceId = DeviceDetail["deviceId"], failureReason = tostring(Status["failureReason"])
| extend KnownDevice = iif(isempty(tostring(deviceId)),"No","Yes")
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies ["displayName"] in (pPolicy)
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies ["result"] in ("reportOnlyFailure","reportOnlyInterrupted")
| extend Split = split(tostring(BrowserDetail)," ")
| mv-expand Browser = Split[0]
| summarize count() by tostring(Browser)
content.title: Failed browser

content.query:
let pPolicy = dynamic([{Policy}]);
SigninLogs
| where startofday(TimeGenerated) == iff(tostring('{datefilter}')=="now",startofday(todatetime(now())),startofday(todatetime('{datefilter:$.x}')))
| extend cfilter = iff(tostring('{datefilter}')=="now",startofday(todatetime(now())),startofday(todatetime('{datefilter:$.x}')))
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies != "[]"
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend PolicyName = ConditionalAccessPolicies["displayName"], result = ConditionalAccessPolicies["result"], Browser = DeviceDetail["browser"], deviceId = DeviceDetail["deviceId"], failureReason = tostring(Status["failureReason"])
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies ["displayName"] in (pPolicy)
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies ["result"] in ("reportOnlyFailure","reportOnlyInterrupted")
| where Identity contains (iff(tostring('{filterIdentity}')=="Identity","","{filterIdentity}"))
| where ClientAppUsed contains (iff(tostring('{filterClientAppUsed}')=="ClientAppUsed","","{filterClientAppUsed}"))
| where Browser contains (iff(tostring('{filterBrowser}')=="Browser","","{filterBrowser}"))
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, Identity, AppDisplayName, ClientAppUsed, deviceId, Browser, result, PolicyName, DeviceDetail, Location
